arts.ttl: Steve Cooper desperate to do well at Leicester after criticism from fans
arts.sum: The Foxes have only won once in all competitions this season.

arts.ttl: Danny Ward the hero with three penalty stops to save Leicester cup embarrassment
arts.sum: Taylor Allen, David Okagbue and Liam Gordon all missed.

arts.ttl: Ward's penalty shoot-out heroics see Leicester past Walsall
arts.sum: Leicester City goalkeeper Danny Ward saved three penalties in a dramatic shoot-out against Walsall to propel the Foxes into the fourth round of the Carabao Cup.

arts.ttl: Leicester player ratings v Walsall as Ward heroics prevent embarrassing exit
arts.sum: At the other end, Facundo Buonanotte looped a header off target, but every other effort came in from distance and did not trouble Tommy Simkin in the Walsall goal, with moments of nice, first-time combination play failing to get City into the box. It took until the 79th minute for City to have their first shot on target, Abdul Fatawu crossing and Buonanotte stooping to head goalwards, but with Tommy Simkin getting down to comfortably save.

arts.ttl: Danny Ward the hero with three penalty saves to dig Leicester out of hole
arts.sum: Taylor Allen, David Okagbue and Liam Gordon all missed.

arts.ttl: Walsall player sends pitch invader to the floor during Carabao Cup clash
arts.sum: A pitch invader was knocked over by Walsall defender David Okagbue before being dragged away by a steward after trying to get towards Leicester manager Steve Cooper

arts.ttl: Leicester City team news v Walsall as Odsonne Edouard decision made amid 10 changes
arts.sum: Odsonne Edouard has been handed his first Leicester City start with Steve Cooper making 10 changes to the team to face Walsall. City (4-2-3-1): Ward; Ricardo, Coady, Okoli, Thomas; Choudhury, Soumare; Fatawu, Buonanotte, De Cordova-Reid; Edouard.

arts.ttl: Premier League announce referee for Arsenal vs Leicester who has already made an apology this season
arts.sum: Samuel Barrott has been appointed for Arsenal vs Leicester City this weekend and he's already made an apology this season.

arts.ttl: Walsall loan man from Birmingham City is a doubt for Leicester City tie
arts.sum: Walsall midfielder George Hall is a ‘doubt’ for their Carabao Cup clash against Leicester City, as detailed in… The post Walsall loan man from Birmingham City is a doubt for Leicester City tie appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: What Leicester City are getting right in search of first win - and what they're getting wrong - Leicestershire Live
arts.sum: City have trailing at half-time in all three of their home matches, the only club in the division for which that is true. Those qualities in defending mean City have only conceded 25 shots on target so far, the same number as Chelsea and Crystal Palace and fewer than seven other sides in the division.
